body.name: Tvilum 8 Drawer Double Dresser, 15.85" D x 55.12" W x 32.17" H, Black Matte
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Friday, February 23. Order within 11 hrs 20 mins
body.description: Keep it clean. Austin 8 Drawer Double Dresser can organize your clothing without overbearing your room. With 8 wide drawers, sweaters and linens find a happy home here. Unique dresser depth makes this ideal for smaller spaces or high traffic areas in bedrooms. Streamlined hardware and round feet give it a simple chic feel. Standing strong with metal drawer glides and an easy to clean foil surface the Austin dresser will be a productive and durable piece in your collection. Pair this Austin 8 Drawer Double Dresser with other items from the Austin collection to complete the look. Dimensions: 15.85" D x 55.12" W x 32.17" H

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 11, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Stylish, affordable, and a perfect upgrade for my space. Highly recommended

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 14, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars 6 hours to build then fell apart in 4 months. DO NOT BUY!!
reviews.reviewText: This product was horrible from the moment I opened the box and found all the screws in unlabelled bags and terribly vague instructions. Ended up taking 6 hours to build even with power tools. You have to drill directly into the wood in spots that don't look like they're supposed to be screwed into. There's no indentation or marking to indicate where to screw so you kind of have to wing it. Then I finally got it together and within 4 months it's completely fallen apart. All the drawer bottoms sag so much that I can't open and close them anymore. Also, the tracks broke on most of the drawers so they can't properly sit in their slots anymore either. And even when the drawers did work, they don't fully extend, they only come out halfway so it was a=so hard to reach the back half of each drawer. The entire thing is a disaster and complete waste of $300. Save your time and money and do not buy this!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 24, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Sturdier and heavier than I thought
reviews.reviewText: This dresser turned out better than anticipated. The bolts and screws are not labeled which I hope all manufacturers would but there’s a video instructions so that helped. It took us about 5 hours to build this. They didn’t want you to use power tools but you need to literally drill a lot holes into the dresser, so I’m not sure how they want us to do that. We used power tools just because it’s faster and we don’t have Superman’s strength. If you are on the fence about this dresser, you can rest assured you are getting a high quality one. Delivery was on time too..

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 14, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Perfect for the price!
reviews.reviewText: This dresser came in 2 boxes, and I’m surprised Amazon managed to keep them together. This took me about 3-4 hours to build, and it turned out PERFECT. It definitely feels cheap, so keep that in mind, but it does the job and looks beautiful. It’ll go by faster if you have a drill, but it’s not required. All the screws and such all came in one bag, not separated at all. My suggestion would be to separate them all out and make sure the amount you have matches what’s in the instructions. Mine came with A LOT of extra pieces. On that note, the instructions were a bit unclear but if you have any common sense and pay attention to detail, you’ll be fine. This is definitely something you don’t want to rush.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 14, 2023
reviews.reviewText: We bought this dresser for our nursery. A few of the pieces got damaged in transit, but nothing serious enough to return it. But once we started putting it together we were short two of the slides for the drawers. Luckily we found some on Amazon that were just about the same slide. Now, trying to attach the drawers, the screws they give you for this don’t work. They are too short and not “wide enough” for the screw hole. I didn’t want to go through the process of contacting the manufacturer because you have to fill out a form and email it back to them, and hope it got back to us in time. I also swapped out the handles for some nice metal ones, the handles it comes with are cheap and plastic. Other than having to find hardware, it looks like it will be an okay dresser..

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 18, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars We love it
reviews.reviewText: The video they tell you to watch helps out a lot. My husband was able to get it together in very little time trying to beat the fastest review time only to see how easy it was to assemble. We recommend laying out all the pieces and separating all the screws before starting. This dresser is very well built when put together. We had extra screws and we didn’t need to use the furniture tie downs to secure it to the wall but it’s always a plus to get them. They are furniture zip ties with wall and furniture secure points. It’s nice they can be undone to reuse when moving or changing the room around instead of having to cut them off.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 12, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 2.0 out of 5 stars Don’t waste you’re money for the dresser or warranty on it.
reviews.reviewText: I got a two year warranty on the dresser and there was an issue with them delivering it the first time because the day of the delivery it got broken in the delivery truck. They sent me a new instead because they couldn’t deliver what has already got broken. But as I got my new one and went to put it together not long after that it was still unsteady and chipped very easily and the drawer would sink in at the bottom and would go back in. I contacted them about it with my warranty and got nothing in return. I paid an additional $100 for a 2 year warranty for nothing. And for them to not contact me back. It’s been four months now and still nothing so I gave up and decided to just warn you guys about this.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 12, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great dresser fair price diy knowledgeable required
reviews.reviewText: I needed a new and larger dresser and in black so searched and found this one it has 8 drawers comes in black and wood color it’s very heavy a must assemble yourself project comes with all the hardware although my package of hardware was missing a few must have screws I’m missing about 12 anyways a fairly time consuming project not recommended for those that aren’t capable of a diy person the dresser was very easy to put together looks great once finished and fully assembled I call it the black onyx and get this if your a diy person here is a suggestion to add a coat of clear laquer finish to it or many a glass top cut to fit upgrade from the plastic knobs that’s are included and again please take your time when assembling it once your Done step back take a deep breath admire your work and take a long nap your gonna need it lol
